full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 124 of 236 LC3KMAX4 Parkinson - Direct 1 A. True. 2 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers these exhibits in evidence. 3 MR. EVERDELL: No objection. 4 THE COURT: GX 264 through 268 are admitted. 5 (Government's Exhibits 264 through 268 received in 6 evidence) 7 8 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, would you please -- excuse 9 me. May I publish, your Honor? 10 THE COURT: You may. 11 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, would you please publish 12 Government Exhibit 264. 13 Q. Mr. Parkinson, what do we see here? 14 A. You are standing in the northeast corner of the kitchen, 15 looking towards the southwest. There's an island with books, 16 stove and other kitchen appliances on top. 17 Q. Let's go now, please, to Government Exhibit 265. 18 Is this the same room from a different angle? 19 A. It is. You're more closely aligned with being at the east, 20 looking to the west. 21 MS. COMEY: Let's go to 266, please. 22 Q. What do we see here? 23 A. This is part of the kitchen, as well, and you are aligned 24 standing to the southeast, looking to the northwest. 25 MS. COMEY: Let's go to 267, please. 26 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018225
